snippet: Not so long ago there might not have been five countertenors in the world who could sing the demanding opera "Artaserse" as it would have been done in 18th-century Italy, possibly with castratos. Now five are assembled under one roof, with a live...
abstract: Not so long ago there might not have been five countertenors in the world who could sing the demanding opera "Artaserse" as it would have been done in 18th-century Italy, possibly with castratos. Now five are assembled under one roof, with a live stream in the offing for Saturday.
